entry.title: It was early in the morning when I first ate toilet paper.

link.title: It was early in the morning when I first ate toilet paper.

entry.content:
Post 196384 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, a few problems here! Firstly, paywalled link; also it looks like you are reviewing or giving your personal opinion of this article, which is something for a personal blog or Twitter rather than Metafilter. Additionally, there is a field for tags, so they should not be included as a part of the post. Please contact us if you have questions! -- taz
entry.summary: Post 196384 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, a few problems here! Firstly, paywalled link; also it looks like you are reviewing or giving your personal opinion of this article, which is something for a personal blog or Twitter rather than Metafilter. Additionally, there is a field for tags, so they should not be included as a part of the post. Please contact us if you have questions! -- taz

entry.content:
